docs.snippet: The Mets’ familiar offensive futility has continued this season, and the doubleheader against the Diamondbacks on Sunday epitomized some of the problems....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Mets’ familiar offensive futility has continued this season, and the doubleheader against the Diamondbacks on Sunday epitomized some of the problems.
docs.abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column; New York Mets have undone the promise of their strong start to the 2014 MLB season; after splitting with the Arizona Diamondbacks--losing, 2-1, and then winning,4-2--the Mets are 7-16 for the month of May; despite their signing of free agents, Mets remain starved for runs.
